content.question: Economic performances of countries are compared with the Gini coefficient that

choices.label: measures standards of living across countries
is an indicator of income inequality
tells the average income of citizens in different countries
adjusts the gross domestic product (GDP) for the cost of living
is a measure of the type of economic system in place

content.answer: is an indicator of income inequality

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
